_sText:
**De_curiosity - Combat map for CS Source**

**Story**

_Since the curiosity rover found a lot of valuable materials on the red planet, everyone started trying to find efficient way to get there first and race begun..._

_As time flew and years passed, in 2032 NASA came up with a plan to build a base on red planet. They had the technology and really, few years after, the first base ever on mars was built. They called it "Curiosity" after the rover that found all the materials. They inteded to do just a research on the materials and were against selling them.
But mining companies did not like this at all, they wanted to start mining everything that has a price._

_They came up with a plan to send a small group of armed man in the base with two simple plans_

_1) - Kill everyone who resists and get hold of the base_

_2) - If plan 1) goes wrong, blow up the main core room or the hydroponics_

**Will they succeed?**

Map

- Custom textures / models
- Soundscapes / ambients
- Radar
- Optimized
- max 64 players
- nav file


I put over 150 hours of work in this map and I would be probably remaking the whole thing, if I just had more time...

Anyway enjoy it :)

**_SkyppySDK_**
